    • Field Detail

      • MAX_NUMBER_OF_OPTIONS

        public static int MAX_NUMBER_OF_OPTIONS

    • Constructor Detail

      • OptionList

        public OptionList()
        Creates a new empty OptionList. The paramter Code is to ensure that only meaningful options are included in the list. If an Option is meaningful or not depends on the Code.

    • Method Detail

      • addOption

        public void addOption(Code code,
             OptionRegistry.OptionName optionName,
             Option option)
               throws InvalidOptionException,
                      ToManyOptionsException
        This method is to add a new Option to the OptionList. The Option will only be added if it satisfies some constraints. It must be meaningful with the Code, given as method parameter. If the OptionList already contains an Option with the same type (i.e. OptionRegistry.OptionName), the new Option will be added if and only if it may occur multiple times in a message with the abovementioned code.
        Parameters:
        code - the message code
        optionName - the name of the option to be added
        option - The option to be added
        Throws:
        InvalidOptionException - if the option cannot be added but is critical and is either of an unrecognized type (see OptionRegistry.OptionName) or occured more often than allowed
        ToManyOptionsException - if adding the option to the list would exceed the maximum number of options per message

      • getOption

        public java.util.List<Option> getOption(OptionRegistry.OptionName optionName)
        Returns a set of matching options from the list in order of there adding to the list
        Parameters:
        optionName - the name of the requested options
        Returns:
        a set of matching options from the list in order of there adding to the list

      • removeAllOptions

        public int removeAllOptions(OptionRegistry.OptionName optionName)
        Removes all options of the given OptionName from the option list and returns the number of removed options
        Parameters:
        optionName - The name of the options to be removed from the option list
        Returns:
        The number of removed options

      • removeTargetURI

        public int removeTargetURI()
        Removes all target URI specific options from the list
        Returns:
        the number of removed options

      • removeLocationURI

        public int removeLocationURI()
        Removes all location URI related options from the list
        Returns:
        the number of removed options
